item.text: [[Consensus Based Projects]]
Consensus - a general agreement about something : an idea or opinion that is shared by all the people in a group.
Term Decentralised Consensus used in connection to technology when transactions are recorded into a distributed public database. It is used in a number of ways.

story.text: Consensus - a general agreement about something : an idea or opinion that is shared by all the people in a group.
Term Decentralised Consensus used in connection to technology when transactions are recorded into a distributed public database. It is used in a number of ways.
For example in the case of [[Bitcoin]] consensus achieved by a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proof-of-work_system proof-of-work system] called [[Mining]].

Disclaimer: This is a confusin term, often used in a wrong way due to the fact that it came into fashion. Here I will try to explore it in a way that it makes more sense and popularise theterm with the minimum amount of BS.
